title: Implement Movement Assessment Databases
description: Add comprehensive database structures for Movement Quality Assessment System: 6 new tables (movement-tests, exercises, training-plan-templates, user-exercise-progress, exercise-assessments-mapping) plus enhancements to assessments table. Includes detailed test descriptions, example videos, P1/P2 priorities, and exercise progress tracking. Source: openspec/changes/add-movement-assessment-databases/

title: Create migration for movement-tests table
description: Create migration for movement-tests table. PK: test_id (N, 1-15). Attributes: name, description, body_region, test_category, evaluation_criteria, scoring_rules, mediapipe_requirements, instructions, detailed_description, example_video_url. GSI: body-region-index, category-index. KMS encryption enabled.
close_reason: Closed

title: Configure AWS Credentials for All Environments
description: Настроить AWS credentials для всех окружений (dev, staging, production) для автоматического деплоя. Использовать комбинированный подход: GitHub Environments для dev/staging, AWS Secrets Manager для production. Обязательно использовать OIDC для всех окружений. Поддержка временного fallback на Access Keys с мониторингом (14 дней).
